General.text:

Postpartum_hemorrhage.text:
Second Line therapy and can be administered sublingually, orally, vaginally, and rectally.
[1]
1,000 mcg administered rectally
800 mcg PO

Special_Populations.text:
Pregnancy Rating
: X
Lactation risk
: Excreted in breastmilk

Contraindications.text:
Allergy to class/drug
Pregnancy (when used to treat ulcers)

Serious.text:
Anaphylaxis
Dysrhythmia, MI
GI bleed
Uterine rupture
Thromboembolic disorder

Common.text:
Diarrhea, abdominal pain, flatulence, nausea
Headache
Anemia
Chest pain
